metadata.title: CVE-2022-0891 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap buffer overflow in ExtractImageSection function in tiffcrop.c inlibtiff library Version 4.3.0 allows attacker to trigger unsafe or out ofbounds memory access via crafted TIFF image file which could result intoapplication crash, potential information disclosure or any othercontext-dependent impact

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0891` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5').
